ValidationRule.description: When a 3rd Party Product is selected, Product Code, Product Name and Vendor Name are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Product2.GDMFSL_3rd_Party_Product__c = TRUE && ( ISBLANK ( GDMFSL_Product_Name__c ) || ISBLANK ( GDMFSL_Product_Code__c ) || ISBLANK ( GDMFSL_Vendor_Name__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Product Name, Product Code and Vendor Name when selecting a 3rd Party Product.
